0.text: Innate: Zeri generates 1 charge for every 40 units she travels by any means and 10 charge every time she casts  Burst Fire, up to a maximum of 100 charge. Her basic attacks consume charge to deal modified damage.Zeri gains maximum charge when the game starts and upon respawning.
0.html:
Innate: Zeri generates 1 charge for every 40 units she travels by any means and 10 charge every time she casts Burst Fire, up to a maximum of 100 charge. Her basic attacks consume charge to deal modified damage.
Zeri gains maximum charge when the game starts and upon respawning.

1.text: Basic Attack: Zeri zaps her target, being  non-projectile, applying spell effects as  spell damage, and triggering on-cast effects. Zeri's basic attacks cannot  critically strike nor trigger  on-hit and on-attack effects.
1.html: Basic Attack: Zeri zaps her target, being non-projectile, applying spell effects as spell damage, and triggering on-cast effects. Zeri's basic attacks cannot critically strike nor trigger on-hit and on-attack effects.

2.text: While not at full charge, Zeri's attacks consume 10 charge to deal 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 3% AP) magic damage. If the target is below  60 − 150 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) health, they are  executed instead. She may still use an uncharged attack even while below 10 charge.
2.html: While not at full charge, Zeri's attacks consume 10 charge to deal 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 3% AP) magic damage. If the target is below  60 − 150 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) health, they are executed instead. She may still use an uncharged attack even while below 10 charge.

3.text: At full charge, Zeri's next attack is empowered to consume all charge to deal 90 − 200 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) (+ 1% − 15% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against  monsters.
3.html: At full charge, Zeri's next attack is empowered to consume all charge to deal 90 − 200 (based on level) (+ 90% AP) (+ 1% − 15% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against monsters.

0.text: Innate: Zeri absorbs the energy of  shields she damages, shielding herself equal to 60% of the post-mitigation damage dealt to the shield. Each instance of shield gained by Living Battery lasts for 3 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Zeri absorbs the energy of shields she damages, shielding herself equal to 60% of the post-mitigation damage dealt to the shield. Each instance of shield gained by Living Battery lasts for 3 seconds.

1.text: Innate - Gotta Zip!: Whenever Zeri receives a shield, she gains  10% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
1.html: Innate - Gotta Zip!: Whenever Zeri receives a shield, she gains  10% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Zeri fires a burst of 7 rounds in the target direction that each deal physical damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Zeri fires a burst of 7 rounds in the target direction that each deal physical damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: Burst Fire's projectile is treated as a  basic attack: it hits any enemy unit a typical basic attack can; deals  basic damage; can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus damage; and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Burst Fire's  cooldown and cast time are reduced with  attack speed, with the maximum of 1.5 attacks per second. 60% of attack speed in excess of the cap is converted into  bonus attack damage.
1.html: Burst Fire's projectile is treated as a basic attack: it hits any enemy unit a typical basic attack can; deals basic damage; can critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus damage; and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Burst Fire's  cooldown and cast time are reduced with  attack speed, with the maximum of 1.5 attacks per second. 60% of attack speed in excess of the cap is converted into  bonus attack damage.

0.text: Active: Zeri fires an electric pulse in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them for 2 seconds.If the pulse hits terrain, it transforms into a laser in a line that grants  sight of the area for 1.75 seconds and fires after 0.75 seconds, applying the same effects to enemies hit and  critically striking for (75% +  35%) bonus damage against  champions and  monsters.
0.html:
Active: Zeri fires an electric pulse in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them for 2 seconds.

If the pulse hits terrain, it transforms into a laser in a line that grants sight of the area for 1.75 seconds and fires after 0.75 seconds, applying the same effects to enemies hit and critically striking for (75% +  35%) bonus damage against champions and monsters.

0.text: Active: Zeri  dashes in the target direction. She will dash farther across terrain if Spark Surge was cast within 50 units of any, gaining  unobstructed vision of the surrounding 800 units and  revealing herself while there are enemy champions within 800 units of her.
0.html: Active: Zeri dashes in the target direction. She will dash farther across terrain if Spark Surge was cast within 50 units of any, gaining unobstructed vision of the surrounding 800 units and revealing herself while there are enemy champions within 800 units of her.

1.text: Afterwards, she gains Lightning Rounds for 6 seconds, empowering her next 3 casts of  Burst Fire to pierce through enemies, though dealing reduced damage after the first and not applying attack effects nor  life steal to secondary targets. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
1.html: Afterwards, she gains Lightning Rounds for 6 seconds, empowering her next 3 casts of Burst Fire to pierce through enemies, though dealing reduced damage after the first and not applying attack effects nor  life steal to secondary targets. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.

2.text: Spark Surge's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds for every  champion Zeri hits with  charged basic attacks or abilities, increased to 1.5 seconds if she does so with a cast of  Burst Fire or  Ultrashock Laser that  critically strikes.
2.html: Spark Surge's cooldown is  reduced by 0.5 seconds for every champion Zeri hits with charged basic attacks or abilities, increased to 1.5 seconds if she does so with a cast of Burst Fire or Ultrashock Laser that critically strikes.

3.text: Spark Surge  resets Zeri's basic attack timer and  Burst Fire's cooldown.  Ultrashock Laser and  Lightning Crash can be cast during the dash.
3.html: Spark Surge resets Zeri's basic attack timer and Burst Fire's cooldown. Ultrashock Laser and Lightning Crash can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity around her that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity around her that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: If Lightning Crash hits at least one enemy champion, Zeri becomes Overcharged for 6 seconds.
1.html: If Lightning Crash hits at least one enemy champion, Zeri becomes Overcharged for 6 seconds.

2.text: Overcharge: Zeri gains  30% bonus attack speed.  Burst Fire is empowered to have a 20% shorter cast time and instead fire 3 rounds that travel with increased speed and deal bonus magic damage to the first enemy hit and the nearest  visible enemy within 450-units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.Secondary targets are dealt 25% AD physical damage, which can  critically strike for (18.75% +  8.75%) AD bonus physical damage. The bonus magic damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html:
Overcharge: Zeri gains  30% bonus attack speed. Burst Fire is empowered to have a 20% shorter cast time and instead fire 3 rounds that travel with increased speed and deal bonus magic damage to the first enemy hit and the nearest visible enemy within 450-units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.

Secondary targets are dealt 25% AD physical damage, which can critically strike for (18.75% +  8.75%) AD bonus physical damage. The bonus magic damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.

3.text: Additionally, Zeri generates stacks of Overcharge from hitting enemy champions, gaining 0.5% bonus movement speed per stack. She generates 1 stack for each one she hits with a  charged basic attack or ability, increased to 3 on abilities that  critically strike and 8 on Lightning Crash.  Burst Fire grants stacks only against the first target hit. Overcharge's duration is extended by 2 seconds whenever Zeri generates a stack, up to its original duration.
3.html: Additionally, Zeri generates stacks of Overcharge from hitting enemy champions, gaining 0.5% bonus movement speed per stack. She generates 1 stack for each one she hits with a charged basic attack or ability, increased to 3 on abilities that critically strike and 8 on Lightning Crash. Burst Fire grants stacks only against the first target hit. Overcharge's duration is extended by 2 seconds whenever Zeri generates a stack, up to its original duration.
